## IContainer.getPerformanceStats() method

Get performance statistics including cache hit rates and memory usage

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPerformanceStats(): {
        cache: any;
        totalRegistered: number;
        memoryUsage: {
            classMap: number;
            instanceMap: number;
            metadataMap: number;
        };
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ cache: any; totalRegistered: number; memoryUsage: { classMap: number; instanceMap: number; metadataMap: number; }; }

Performance statistics object
